snippet: The family of a black man shot and killed by the San Francisco police in an encounter captured on video is demanding a federal civil rights investigation.
abstract: Family of Mario Woods, black man shot and killed by San Francisco police in December 2015, demands Dept of Justice conduct a federal civil rights investigation for five police officers involved.
lead_paragraph: The family of a black man shot and killed by the San Francisco police in an encounter captured on video is demanding a federal civil rights investigation.

headline.main: California: Federal Inquiry Sought in Shooting
headline.print_headline: California: Federal Inquiry Sought in Shooting
